title: Evaluations

definitions.BLEU score: A metric for evaluating the quality of text which measures the similarity between the machine's output and a set of reference translations.

formulas: BLEU score = (Sum of n-gram matches / Sum of n-gram counts in reference)
summary: The slide presents an example of a model's output on a summarization task, comparing the quality of text before and after training using BLEU scores. It discusses a sports-related incident involving players Kyle Naughton and David Meyer, highlighting the impact of a red card challenge and subsequent injuries. The slide also mentions a player's return to the team and a decision by a referee.
